commit.message: Update API docs and module.md file in jsonutils

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            This module provides utility functions to manipulate built-in `json` data type. It provides APIs to convert an `xml` to a `json`, or convert a `table` to a `json`.
          
          
            
            This module provides utility functions to manipulate the built-in `json` data type. It provides APIs to convert an `xml` to a `json` or convert a `table` to a `json`.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            # + options - The `XmlOptions` record consisting the configurations for the conversion
          
          
            
            # + options - The `XmlOptions` record consisting of the configurations for the conversion

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            # + return - The JSON representation of the given XML or an error if the conversion fails
          
          
            
            # + return - The JSON representation of the given XML or else an error if the conversion fails
          
      
    
    
  

Refer the guideline for the description of the return statement.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            # + return - The JSON representation of the given XML on success, else returns an `error`
          
          
            
            # + return - The JSON representation of the given XML on success, else returns an `error`
          
      
    
    
  

Please refer the guidelines on the template for the return statment.
